org.nd4j.linalg.util

Class Shape

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.nd4j.linalg.util.Shape

  • public class Shape
extends java.lang.Object
    Encapsulates all shape related logic (vector of 0 dimension is a scalar is equivalent to a vector of length 1...)
